hanzi-su-wiki:
険

Значения

Обрывистый, крутой; строгий, опасный

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Справа — человек 人, рот 口, а также треугольник — символ единства в значении собираться вместе и горланить, «сообща». Опасность совместного нахождения у крепостной стены 阝 — хорошая мишень для противника.

  • "Человек 人 смотрит на крутую гору на автобусной остановке."

Варианты

險, 险
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiǎn
Japanese variant of 险
Японский вариант страхования

險險RS
险险		険narrow pass, strategic point, adventure
  • place surrounded by slopes 阝 defended with arrows 僉/佥/㑒
heisig_constituent: precipitous, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, awl, fit, meeting, umbrella, mouth, person
Keyword_KANJIDIC: precipitous, inaccessible place, impregnable position, steep place, sharp eyes
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: обрывистое, недоступное место, неприступная позиция, крутые места, острые глаза
koohiiStory1: The rock climber trying to get up to the pinnacle is dangling from a precipitous edge, hanging only one with his icepick.
koohiiStory2: Well I have someone climbing an inflatable precipitous pinnacle. Once at the top it is so precipitous that the person is afraid to climb down and instead punctures the inflatable pinnacle with an awl to get safely and slowly back to the ground.
jp_example_words:
保険(ほけん): insurance, guarantee
険しい(けわしい): inaccessible place, impregnable position, steep place, sharp eyes
冒険(ぼうけん): risk, venture, adventure
危険(きけん): danger
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Going into a building made by a squid is risky. First of all, squids only have tentacles, no bones, and they make all of their buildings out of risky materials like kelp and sharp coral.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: One squid got stuck in his own building, but no one could save him because going in would be too risky. Poor little squid.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: "It's too risky, leave me!" the squid cries. "I'll save you, underwater citizen! Nothing is too risky for Ken (けん) the samurai!" The building is collapsing on the squid, the risk is so great, but Ken the samurai dives in and saves him!
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
The squid cries, "I can build one that isn't so risky next time!" Ken shakes his head, "I'm not letting you do anymore risky things, you're coming with me from now on." Ken scoops up the squid into a bucket, hoists him over his shoulder, and walks off into the sunset.
Who knows what adventures await our new duo. All we know is that they'll definitely be getting into some risky business.
Ru_Meaning: precipitous, inaccessible place, impregnable position, steep place, sharp eyes
Ru_Notes:
В основном используется в значении "опасность" и в производных слова "страхование".
Сравни: 検 (しらべる、ケン изучение), 倹 (つましい、ケン бережливость), 険 (けわしい、ケン опасный, трудный)
Ru_Words:

  • суровый, сердитый, грозный
    • 保険ほけん
  • страхование; гарантия
    • 冒険ぼうけん
  • авантюра, приключение
    • 危険きけん
  • опасность
Ru_Radicals: 人 (человек), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 口 (рот), 阡
Kanshudo_mnemonic: we're unanimous (㑒) that the hill (⻏) is steep

xiǎn
яп. вм. 险

険

Значения

Обрывистый, крутой; строгий, опасный

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Справа — человек 人, рот 口, а также треугольник — символ единства в значении собираться вместе и горланить, «сообща». Опасность совместного нахождения у крепостной стены 阝 — хорошая мишень для противника.

  • "Человек 人 смотрит на крутую гору на автобусной остановке."

Варианты

險, 险

Radicals: 阝  (building, squid)
Meaning Mnemonic
Going into a building made by a squid is risky. First of all, squids only have tentacles, no bones, and they make all of their buildings out of risky materials like kelp and sharp coral.
One squid got stuck in his own building, but no one could save him because going in would be too risky. Poor little squid.
Reading Mnemonic
"It's too risky, leave me!" the squid cries. "I'll save you, underwater citizen! Nothing is too risky for Ken (けん) the samurai!" The building is collapsing on the squid, the risk is so great, but Ken the samurai dives in and saves him!
The squid cries, "I can build one that isn't so risky next time!" Ken shakes his head, "I'm not letting you do anymore risky things, you're coming with me from now on." Ken scoops up the squid into a bucket, hoists him over his shoulder, and walks off into the sunset.
Who knows what adventures await our new duo. All we know is that they'll definitely be getting into some risky business.
